name: Sacrifice (itch) (GuiDB)
description:
First of all, I know there are many bugs, and the game is unfinished with only 2 unpolished levels. Second of all, just so you know, I did it all by myself (with some assets from the web, of course) in only one day. It's not an excuse, but I know that the game is kinda broken so I am warning you beforehand.

Now about the game: It is meant to be about you giving your life for the next character to proceed, i.e., if there are a path made with spikes, you may kill your character and use your dead body as a platform to walk above the spikes without touching them.
